"Timezones Today" allows user to have time in multiple Timezones of on new tab of Google Chrome.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the "Timezones Today" Chrome extension and setting Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. 

Search results will be provided by Microsoft Bing. 

Terms & Conditions: https://timezones.today/terms.php
Privacy Policy: https://timezones.today/privacy.php
